sub_title: Lending Transaction Management Expert at ING Bank | Portuguese and Brazilian Licensed Attorney
summary:
Qualified Lawyer in Brazil and Portugal | Master's Student at the University of Lisbon | Arbitration | Commercial & Contract Law | Trade Finance | Technology

Welcome to my LinkedIn profile! I am a qualified lawyer licensed in Brazil and Portugal. Currently, I am pursuing a Master's degree at the University of Lisbon. In addition, I also participated in a master's exchange program at Erasmus University in the Netherlands for a year, which further enriched my academic journey.

With fluency in Portuguese, English, intermediary Spanish, and basic Dutch, I excel in multicultural environments and thrive in fast-paced office settings. I have a proven ability to handle multiple tasks, pay meticulous attention to detail, and effectively manage my time.

My expertise lies in Commercial and Contract Law, Trade Finance and Banking Law, and International Arbitration. I am particularly passionate about these fields. Furthermore, I have expanded my knowledge in technology-related legal areas such as Intellectual Property Law, Computer and Law, and Trade Finance and Banking Law through specialized courses at Erasmus University.

In addition to my legal skills, I am proficient in various systems including Vantage, Companyinfo, SAP, CRM, Recover, Citrix, JDE, Reports Now, CPJ, Ethos, and the Microsoft Office suite (Word, PowerPoint, Excel).

Currently, I contribute my skills as a Lending Transaction Management Expert in the Reporting, Monitoring & Lending Analytics Team (‘RMLA’) at ING Corporate Sector Lending Netherlands.

Feel free to reach out and connect. I am always open to engaging in professional conversations and expanding my network.

projects.title: Research and Study Group on Efficiency in Tax Collection
projects.description: The goal of the project was to rethink the tax system as a whole and provide alternatives for restructuring the Brazilian model. The group's work was subdivided into subgroups, which were responsible for analyzing concrete data of judgments before the Administrative Council of Tax resources of the Ministry of Finance. We concluded with a parallel developed between the efficiency of the administrative tax procedural system and other foreign jurisdictions

projects.title: National Scientific and Technological Initiation Scholarship - FAPEMIG
projects.description:
The program is the first contact that the university student has with academic research. Scientific initiation consists of an in-depth study of a topic chosen by the student in any area of ​​knowledge, for approximately one year, with the help of an advisor from his faculty.

It is aimed at undergraduate students who have an interest in research, think about pursuing an academic career, or wish to carry out a study on a certain topic.

profile_positions.title: Lending Transaction Management Expert at Corporate Sector Lending

profile_positions.description:
Internship at the Corporate Sector Lending department of ING, working with day-to-day operations, e.g. analysis of companies’ key figures, creation of internal ratings and reports, processing of relevant standardized credit cases, portfolio and data quality monitoring; 
Moreover, I prepared portfolio reports and loan templates (for Corporate Sector Lending NL) and I was the contact person for this towards external and internal partners, e.g. inquiries from ING Risk Controlling, international ING colleagues, customer representatives, auditors, internal and external auditors. 
Within ING I experienced the importance of regulatory changes impact Banking, and I assisted various projects for Corporate Sector Lending NL in order to remain data and regulatory compliant. 
In addition, I helped supporting large Dutch and International clients. 
This work was extremely enriching since I also learned about internal Lending procedures and finance processes by collaborating with colleagues from various departments.
profile_positions.title: Intern at Corporate Sector Lending

profile_positions.description:
WeVooV is a startup focused on services, products and news from Portugal. When I joined the company I was the main responsible for working with contract analysis, brand protection measures, as well as I was a support in the hiring of new interns and IT technicians. I also helped in the coordination and decision making of social media marketing measures. My work at WeVooV was vast, due to the small amount of people in the team, and especially because of the trust that the CEO Jufeng Wu deposited in me. 

Main accomplishments: WeVooV brand protected at national level; Drafts of employment contracts and internship used in the hiring of new staff; Interviews conducted with approximately 30 people, resulting in the hiring of 1 IT technician and 4 interns.
profile_positions.title: Office Coordinator

company.name: Ministério Público do Estado de Minas Gerais

profile_positions.company: Ministério Público do Estado de Minas Gerais
profile_positions.description:
The Public Prosecutor's Office of Minas Gerais (MPMG) acts in the fight against drug trafficking by means of the Toxic Prosecutors' Offices, which have the attribution of proposing criminal action, issuing opinions, and participating in hearings in the Courts and in the councils that deliberate on the matter.
I worked there in a postgraduate level internship 13th Prosecutor's Office mainly working with: Draft complaints at first instance, as well as reasons and counterarguments for appeal. To be able to do so it was required an extensive knowledge of Brazilian criminal law, as well as procedural law and of Law No. 11.343 (Brazil's drug law). 

Main accomplishments: as assistant to the prosecutor Renato Boechat, I actively participated in indictments, reasons and counter-arguments of appeal of several cases involving drug trafficking and was able to optimize the amount of his work, since the first (and sometimes final) analysis was done by me.
profile_positions.title: Legal Assistant

company.name: Ministério Público do Estado de Minas Gerais

profile_positions.title: Legal Assistant

profile_positions.description:
Aquila Institute is an international consulting organization which provides world-class managerial solutions focused on the improvement of results for its clients. The Institute has activities in 20 countries in America, Europe, Africa and Oceania, conducting over 1200 projects with the support of offices in Brazil, Colombia, Australia and Switzerland. In Zurich the company a Research Center for the development of research lines and innovations in Management.

Internship focused in internal and corporate legal. Among my main activities were draft and review of contracts; Assistance in contract management; Assistance in completing the CPJ (Judicial Process System); Help in dealing with the partners, and in all matters involving the corporate acts.
profile_positions.title: Corporate Legal Assistant

profile_positions.description:
Kinross is engaged in mineral research and development, mining, processing and trading of gold. It is one of the largest gold producers in Brazil, accounting for 22% of the domestic production. With operations at the Morro do Ouro mine, in Paracatu, northwestern Minas Gerais, and an office in Belo Horizonte, the company is part of Kinross Gold Corporation, a Canadian group with operations in South America (Brazil and Chile), North America (United States and Canada), Africa (Ghana and Mauritania), and Eurasia (Russia).

I worked at Kinross as an intern at the office in Belo Horizonte. The Internship was focused on business and labor law issues, working with: Assistance in legal advice; Organization and filing of corporate, procedural and related data; Drafts of notifications, legal memorandum, letters and contracts; Control of procedural deadlines and administrative assistance.
profile_positions.title: Legal Intern

profile_positions.description:
Petrobras is a publicly traded company, whose majority shareholder is the Government of Brazil and is therefore a state-owned company. With its headquarters in Rio de Janeiro, it currently operates in 14 countries in the energy segment, primarily in the areas of exploration, production, refining, marketing and transportation of oil, natural gas and their derivatives.

I joined the company to participate in a technical-level internship in the commercial department in the office situated in Belo Horizonte, working with: Document archive; Creation and incorporation of data in Excel spreadsheets and systems SAP and CRM; Issuing purchase orders and other sector specific commercial tasks.
profile_positions.title: Management Intern
